title: Crud Application
description: This React.js CRUD application allows users to manage profiles with features for creating, reading, updating, and deleting records. It includes a form with real-time validation for user details and image upload in PNG format, and select a country from a dynamically fetched list. Profiles are displayed in a paginated table, with options to edit or delete entries. The application showcases effective state management and form handling in React.

title: React API  Weather App
description: My weather web app allows users to fetch weather data by entering a City name. It provides real-time information on temperature, humidity, weather conditions, and wind speed. Additionally, the app dynamically sets the background image according to the current weather, enhancing the user experience with a visually relevant interface.

title: ChatGPT-Clone
description: My ChatGPT Clone UI is look like the real ChatGPT interface. While it doesn't include all the original features, it showcases my skills in creating clean and user-friendly designs. The interface is responsive and works well on different devices. This project highlights my ability to build attractive and functional user interfaces. It demonstrates my proficiency in front-end development.

title: React BG-Changer
description: My simple background changer website allows users to easily switch between different background colors with just a click. This straightforward tool provides a quick and user-friendly way to personalize the visual experience of a webpage, making it an engaging and enjoyable feature for users.

title: Portfolio
description: My responsive portfolio website, built with Tailwind CSS, showcases my projects and skills in a clean and modern design. Tailwind CSS allows for rapid and efficient styling, resulting in a visually appealing and highly functional site. The responsive design ensures that the portfolio looks great on all devices, from desktops to mobile phones, providing an optimal user experience.
